title: Fermionic correlators on the holographic neutron star
authors: Lucas Acito, Tob\'ias Canavesi, Nicol\'as Grandi, Adri\'an Lugo
abstract:
We investigate the fermionic perturbations of the asymptotically AdS
background known as holographic neutron star, which represents a highly
degenerate state of strongly coupled fermions on a sphere at finite
temperature. We calculate the two-point correlator of a fermionic operator and
obtain its scaling properties as we approach the critical region of the phase
diagram.
